tns:patch.author: vchihai
tns:patch.description: Make Activity Form root FM Path visible

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_modules_templates (template, ampModule) SELECT (SELECT cast(settingsvalue AS int) AS template FROM amp_global_settings WHERE settingsname = 'Visibility Template'), (SELECT id AS ampModule FROM amp_modules_visibility WHERE name = '/Activity Form') WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT template FROM amp_modules_templates WHERE template = (SELECT cast(settingsvalue AS int) AS template FROM amp_global_settings WHERE settingsname = 'Visibility Template') AND ampModule = (SELECT id FROM amp_modules_visibility WHERE name = '/Activity Form') );
